statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM fashion_products WHERE color = 'Blue'
SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE size = 'M' AND color = 'Red'
SELECT id, product_name FROM fashion_products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100
SELECT DISTINCT color FROM fashion_products
SELECT product_name FROM fashion_products WHERE size = 'S' AND color = 'Black'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fashion_products
SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price FROM fashion_products
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM fashion_products
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM fashion_products
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT size) AS num_sizes FROM fashion_products
SELECT * FROM fashion_products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, color FROM fashion_products ORDER BY color, product_name
SELECT * FROM fashion_products LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM fashion_products OFFSET 10
SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE price < 30 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, price FROM fashion_products WHERE color IN ('Red', 'Blue')
SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE color LIKE 'B%'
SELECT product_name, size FROM fashion_products WHERE size IN ('S', 'M', 'L')
SELECT id, product_name, color, size FROM fashion_products WHERE price > 100
SELECT * FROM clothing;
SELECT name, price FROM clothing;
SELECT * FROM brands;
SELECT name, established_year FROM brands;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c INNER JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c LEFT JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c RIGHT JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id WHERE c.price > 50;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id WHERE b.established_year < 1990;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM clothing;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_clothing FROM clothing;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM clothing;
SELECT MIN(price) AS min_price FROM clothing;
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM clothing;
SELECT DISTINCT(name) FROM clothing;
SELECT b.name, COUNT(c.id) AS num_clothing FROM brands b JOIN clothing c ON b.id = c.id GROUP BY b.name;
SELECT b.name, AVG(c.price) AS avg_price FROM brands b JOIN clothing c ON b.id = c.id GROUP BY b.name;
SELECT SUM(c.price) AS total_price, b.name FROM clothing c JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id GROUP BY b.name;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c FULL JOIN brands b ON c.id = b.id;
SELECT c.name, c.price, b.name AS brand FROM clothing c CROSS JOIN brands b;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_name, headquarters_location FROM Brand;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, brand_id FROM Product;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer;
SELECT gender, age FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customer;
SELECT * FROM Brand JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id;
SELECT Brand.brand_name, Product.product_name FROM Brand JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id;
SELECT * FROM Brand JOIN Product ON Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id WHERE Brand.brand_name = 'Brand1';
SELECT * FROM Product JOIN Brand ON Product.brand_id = Brand.brand_id;
SELECT Product.product_name, Brand.brand_name FROM Product JOIN Brand ON Product.brand_id = Brand.brand_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%product%';
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customer WHERE age >= 25 AND age <= 40;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Product;
SELECT * FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_id, brand_name FROM Brand;
SELECT brand_id, COUNT(*) FROM Product GROUP BY brand_id;
SELECT * FROM Category;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM Category;
SELECT category_id, COUNT(*) FROM Product GROUP BY category_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, brand_id, category_id FROM Product;
SELECT product_id, product_name, brand_name, category_name FROM Product JOIN Brand ON Product.brand_id = Brand.brand_id JOIN Category ON Product.category_id = Category.category_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) FROM Purchase GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Brand WHERE brand_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_name LIKE '%Phone%';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_name LIKE '%Phone%' AND brand_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_name FROM Product JOIN Category ON Product.category_id = Category.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Electronics';
SELECT brand_name FROM Brand;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM Category;
SELECT product_name, brand_id, category_id FROM Product;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order;
SELECT brand_name, category_name FROM Brand, Category;
SELECT product_name, brand_id, category_id FROM Product WHERE brand_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, category_name, product_name FROM Brand, Category, Product WHERE Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id AND Category.category_id = Product.category_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer, Order WHERE Customer.customer_id = Order.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer, Order WHERE Customer.customer_id = Order.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer, Order WHERE Customer.customer_id = Order.customer_id AND total_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer, Order WHERE Customer.customer_id = Order.customer_id AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT brand_name, category_name, product_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Brand, Category, Product, Order WHERE Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id AND Category.category_id = Product.category_id AND Product.product_id = Order.order_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM Customer, Order WHERE Customer.customer_id = Order.customer_id AND total_amount < 500;

SELECT brand_name, category_name, product_name, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Brand, Category, Product, Customer WHERE Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id AND Category.category_id = Product.category_id AND Product.product_id = Order.order_id AND Order.customer_id = Customer.customer_id;

SELECT brand_name, category_name, product_name, customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM Brand, Category, Product, Customer, Order WHERE Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id AND Category.category_id = Product.category_id AND Product.product_id = Order.order_id AND Order.customer_id = Customer.customer_id AND total_amount > 1000;

SELECT brand_name, category_name, product_name, customer_name, email, phone_number, order_date, total_amount FROM Brand, Category, Product, Customer, Order WHERE Brand.brand_id = Product.brand_id AND Category.category_id = Product.category_id AND Product.product_id = Order.order_id AND Order.customer_id = Customer.customer_id AND order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND total_amount < 1000;
